Help!

Wow! you pressed the help menu!

You are one of those rare users who are brave enough to read after something they are curoius! Maximum respect!

A small hint about this app:

  • This is not charging your battery! Of course not! It\'s not a rocket science to figure out this app never works. It is impossible to solar charge you phone without any hardware solar panel support.
  • This application is probably draining your battery :) of course not mutch.

What actually works then?

  • the light VU meter detects the amount of light what your devices proximity sensor can receive,
  • you can open/close the VU meter by pressing it
  • your battery level -displayed on the top- shows correct percentage
  • if the external light is above a certain level it plays a nice animation for charging.
  • you can change the solar panel background
  • you can enable/disable the to prevent the device going to sleep.

Why this app is good for then?

  • After a couple of drinks it is fun to show your friends what a brilliant app you have.
  • It was a good study for this small project to see how the workflowis going on in Android development from the sdk install to an actual release.
  • Each time I browse the Android market I find idiots giving one star to an application because of their own lame stupidness. I wanted to collect some of those people\'s and their comments. So I had to create something what is obviously not working :) To confuse those llamas feel free to give 5 star rating with comments like \'wow it works\' or \'it saved my life\'... Be creative ;)
